title: If My Heart Had Wings
notes: Requires a 32-bit prefix with the following workaround to work with vanilla wine: winetricks -q devenum quartz wmp10. It won't work with steamplay as it doesn't support 32-bit prefixes yet. There is an alternative approach that involves re-encoding videos, but I wasn't able to get it to work: https://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=30779

title: If My Heart Had Wings
notes: Game starts, but crashes every time in the same moment

title: If My Heart Had Wings
notes: Runs perfectly, but a "this environment is not supported" error appears at startup.

title: If My Heart Had Wings
